name: Heimdall
text: Sentinel of Asgard — You may include [[asgard]] allies from any aspect in your deck. Action: Search your deck and discard pile for the Hofund upgrade and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.) “Even Blinded, I can see the truth, Sif..”

name: Heimdall
text: God of Vigilance — Response: After a card you own prevents a minion from entering play, any amount of threat from being placed on a scheme or a friendly character from taking any amount of damage, remove 2 threat from a scheme. (Limit once per phase.)

name: Banishing Blow
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 3 damage to an enemy. Flip The Bifrost to its [[closed]] side. Hero Interrupt: When a minion enters play, exhaust Hofund → discard that minion instead. If an [[elite]] minion was discarded this way, shuffle it into the encounter deck. Flip The Bifrost to its [[closed]] side. "I'll use telepathy to get a census--"

name: Cosmic Strike
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 8 damage to an enemy. If The Bifrost is on its [[opened]] side, you may exhaust Hofund → this attack gains overkill and deal 2 damage to each other enemy. "Allfathers. Let the dark magic flow through me one last time." -Heimdall

name: "Get Me Out!"
text: Hero Interrupt (defense): When a friendly character would take any amount of damage from an attack, exhaust The Bifrost → prevent all of that damage. Flip The Bifrost to its [[opened]] side. If The Bifrost was already on its [[opened]] side, confuse the attacking enemy. "Allfathers. Let the dark magic flow through me one last time." -Heimdall

name: Heimdall's Observatory
text: While Heimdall is in alter-ego form, he gets +2 REC. Alter-Ego Response: After you change form, exhaust this card → shuffle up to 2 allies from your discard pile into your deck. "You wish to know what I see?" -Heimdall

name: All-Hearing
text: While Heimdall is in hero form, he gets +1 THW. Hero Interrupt: When any amount of threat would be placed on a scheme (except during step 1 of the villain phase), exhaust this card → prevent 1 of that threat. “I'm okay, guys. I'm still in Colossus's armored form...” —Synch

name: All-Seeing
text: Hero Action: Exhaust this card → look at the top 1[per_hero] cards of the encounter deck. If you looked at any minion, you may put it into play engaged with you to remove 2 threat from a scheme. “I see WARS, Odinson.” —Heimdall

name: Gjallarhorn
text: Each of your [[asgard]] allies costs 1 fewer resource to play. Hero Response: After an ally you control defeats a minion or a side scheme, draw 1 card. “The end is come! The horn is sounded!” —Freja

name: Guardian of the Rainbow Bridge
text: While The Bifrost is on its [[opened]] side, Heimdall gains retaliate 1. While The Bifrost is on its [[closed]] side, Heimdall gains steady. Hero Interrupt: When a minion enters play, exhaust this card → ready Heimdall. “They shall not pass.” —Heimdall

name: Hofund
text: While The Bifrost is on its [[opened]] side and Heimdall is in hero form, he gets +1 ATK. Hero Action: Exhaust this card and spend 1 resource of any type → flip The Bifrost. “I can always hear its call.” —Heimdall

name: Shared Vision
text: Attach to a friendly character. Temporary. Attached character gets +2 THW. Interrupt: When the attached ally would take any amount of consequential damage, discard this card → prevent 1 of that damage. “See through NEW EYES." -Jane Foster

name: The Bifrost
text: Permanent. Setup. Interrupt: When a minion would be revealed from a non-set aside area, give it to the villain as a facedown boost card instead (shuffle it into the encounter deck instead if it was an [[elite]] minion). Then, flip this card.

name: The Bifrost
text: Permanent. The first minion revealed each round gains quickstrike. Hero Action: Exhaust this card → search your deck for an [[asgard]] ally (any ally instead if you also exhaust Hofund) and add it to your hand.
